with uh Marine

languages of
Fortran C
C++ and mat lab we use it for
solving h a suite of problems in Marine

matlb the way the students are
evaluated are in three forms their
participation in class is one of the
forms another and very important form is
their
performance on the problem sets we have
seven or eight problem sets
during the course of the term we do help
them with the problem sets although a
great deal of the work is done on their
own all of the problem sets require them
writing matlb programs in mat lab
programs are called M
scripts and then there are usually
two take-home quizzes Which are really
glorified problem sets the pedagogical
approach that we
use starts out in the teaching of mat
lab with uh
reading about how the Matlab language
Works uh the students doing homework
assignments with the programming that
they can do on their own personal
computers or on the
MIT uh computer system which has matlb
on it and in the
classroom we have a computer with mat
lab on it and we
demonstrate how to
to run the various
problems that they will
encounter in the
classroom by uh uh operating the matlb
code which is either developed in class
or developed ahead of class in the
classroom show them how it works show
them what mistakes cause
and show them various approaches in real
time in
class uh
subsequently after they've become
proficient in mat lab the
pedagogy turns more to uh a lecture
format that describes how to do
problems often
the approach is done with view
graphs it's occasionally done by doing

with matlb programs and the matlb
programs are run on a computer with a

results of running mat lab code for the

shown in the form of view

of specific

numerical
